description:
Wait a minute; there`s a switch on the bottom of Yuko`s ancestor statue. What happens if it`s turned on? Later, Yuko needs cash fast cause she owes Momo A LOT of money!
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Kokoro Togisumase!! Mahou Shoujo no Aratanaru Chikara
Sharpen Your Mind!! The Newly Awakened Powers of the Magical Girl
心研ぎ澄ませ!! 魔法少女の新たなる力
